title: Why does my liquid soap get watery after the days of production? - Quora

response.answer_text: What days of production? Are you trying to liquify hard bar soap? If so, as you have already learned, it really doesn’t work. Liquid ‘soap’ is synthetic detergent, which works in the same way as real soap does but is made of synthetic ingredients, whereas hard soap is made from fats and an alkali and can’t be liquified so you get something like liquid hand soap or dish detergent. What you get when you try to liquify soap is a very slimy mess that will separate, just as you’ve seen.
